title: Advanced NLP with spaCy
description: In this course, you'll learn how to use spaCy, a fast-growing industry standard library for NLP in Python, to build advanced natural language understanding systems, using both rule-based and machine learning approaches.
bio: I'm Ines, and I'm one of the core developers of spaCy and the co-founder of Explosion. I specialise in applications and developer tools for AI, Machine Learning and Natural Language Processing technologies.
